app.name: BootMii Config Editor
app.long_description:
Allows you to modify the video, autoboot, and bootdelay options from the BootMii ini file (sd:/bootmii/bootmii.ini) directly on the wii.
You can change the following options: - Video: NSTC/PAL50/PAL60/PROGRESSIVE - Autoboot: Off / System Menu / Homebrew Channel - Boot Delay: Time in Seconds from 0 to 10
You can also enable/disable bootmii by utilising an option to rename the directory to ~bootmii. If you have a bootmii alternative installed such as 'Mike' you can use the same option to switch between implementations (/bootmii and /~bootmii).
The application is console based and controlled via the wiimote d-pad or game cube pad.
UP/DOWN - to move through menu items, LEFT/RIGHT - to change the options A BUTTON - to select the save/discard option. HOME - Open the settings menu where you can change the language, skin and enable/disable online update of the application.
For development information of BootMii configuration Editor See http://www.pembo.co.uk
For more information about bootmii See http://www.bootmii.org
